message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I believe I can offer you $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $110.  I believe this product will really benefit you and  $110 is a fair price.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
